title: AI firm Cohere raises US$500M, giving US$6.8B valuation
description: Cohere says it’s raised US$500 million, giving the Canadian artificial intelligence firm a US$6.8 billion valuation.
content:
Aidan Gomez, co-founder of Cohere, attends the Collision Conference in Toronto on Tuesday, June 18, 2024.THE CANADIAN PRESS/Chris Young

title: As A Dire Revenue Warning Roils C3.ai Stock, The Company's Search For New Leadership Captures Investor Attention
description: Shares of C3.ai are continuing their decline on Thursday. The enterprise artificial intelligence company is grappling with the fallout from a dire preliminary earnings report.
content: Shares of C3.ai Inc AI are continuing their decline on Thursday as the enterprise artificial intelligence company grapples with the fallout from a dire preliminary earnings report. The stock has fallen over 20% in the past five trading sessions, reac... [2642 chars]

title: xAI co-founder leaves Elon Musk’s AI startup to launch AI safety fund, joining wave of executive departures
description: Another senior figure is walking away from Elon Musk’s AI empire. Igor Babuschkin, one of the original co-founders of Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI, announced Wednesday that he's stepping down to start an investment firm focused on AI safety. The new venture, Babuschkin Ventures, will fund research and startups working to make AI more secure
